title: NEED CUSTOM EVENT TICKET PULLING PROGRAM MADE FOR TICKETMASTER AND OTHER SITES
snippet:
Hello,

I'm looking to develop a bot that can grab hundreds of tickets for multiple events simultaneously and let me choose which tickets from the list to buy with just a single click on Ticketmaster, Livenation and potentially other sites as well.  

The software will need to be integrated with a 3rd party CAPTCHA bypassing services which allows me to bypass the CAPTCHAs from these websites.  

Here are other things the software will need to have:

Grabs tickets and hold for me instantly as soon as they get dropped
Scheduler: To start searching for tickets at a given time.
Works on Onsale  as well as Pre-Sale events
Grabs only particular tickets having specified section and/or row
Notify me via email/sms/sound when tickets are found
Option to automatically purchase tickets as soon as they are found
Multiple Proxies for different threads or another way of making sure my location can not be discovered

I actually have a similar program already but it is cookie cutter.  I'd be willing to provide that software for you to work with as a starting guide.  This software actually has a video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkf_CX4J1eQ

I would want to have a phone discussion with potential freelancers, so please provide a phone number and best times to call.
